long_description: The Marin Bridgeway Bike is the perfect vehicle for a leisurely ride around the lake or to and from work. Fenders and a chainguard help protect you from road grit and grease for year-round comfort. 6061 aluminum frame features hydroformed top tube and down tube to increase strength without adding weight; shaped seatstays resist flex for improved pedaling efficiency. 7-speed drivetrain offers gears for hilly and flat conditions without overcomplicating things for everyday use. SRAM X3 trigger shifter and rear derailleur supply quick, snappy shifts. Linear-pull brakes supply controlled deceleration and full stopping power when you need it; front brake features a power modulator for even greater control and response. Vittoria Adventure tires boast stout puncture protection to deter deflating flats; wide tires add stability at slow speeds. Kickstand keeps the bike upright while you duck into a cafe, enjoy a picnic or go about your day. Specs on the Marin Bridgeway bike are subject to change. Overstock.
